lead_paragraph: The Defense Department said it was still assessing whether the men, two of Al Qaeda’s most senior leaders operating in the country, were killed in the drone strikes.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon Says Airstrikes Targeted Qaeda Leaders
headline.main: Pentagon Says Airstrikes Targeted 2 Qaeda Leaders in Afghanistan

snippet: The Defense Department said it was still assessing whether the men, two of Al Qaeda’s most senior leaders operating in the country, were killed in the drone strikes....
abstract: Pentagon announces American airstrikes against senior Al Qaeda leaders Faruq al-Qatani and Bilal al-Utabi in eastern Afghanistan; officials describe operation as most significant in country in several years.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
